sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ chéngrèn wǒ de cuòwù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'admets mon erreur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I admit my mistake.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我想打听一下火车站在哪里。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng dǎting yīxià huǒchēzhàn zài nǎlǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je voudrais me renseigner sur l'emplacement de la gare.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I would like to inquire about where the train station is.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā dádào le zìjǐ de mùbiāo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a atteint son objectif.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He achieved his goal.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Dāngchū wǒ bù yīnggāi zhème zuò.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Au départ, je n'aurais pas dû faire cela.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: At the beginning, I shouldn't have done this.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen xuéwán le dì yī dānyuán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous avons terminé la première unité.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We have finished the first unit.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这部电影的导演很有名。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè bù diànyǐng de dǎoyǎn hěn yǒumíng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le réalisateur de ce film est très célèbre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The director of this movie is very famous.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Fēijī yǐjīng dàodá le jīchǎng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'avion est déjà arrivé à l'aéroport.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The plane has already arrived at the airport.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 请把文件用电子邮件发给我。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bǎ wénjiàn yòng diànzǐ yóujiàn fā gěi wǒ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez m'envoyer le document par e-mail.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please send me the document by email.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Diànhuà tūrán duàn le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'appel a soudainement été coupé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The phone call suddenly got disconnected.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jiārén shì wǒ gōngzuò de dònglì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ma famille est ma motivation pour travailler.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: My family is my motivation for work.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们应该平等对待每个人。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen yīnggāi píngděng duìdài měi gè rén.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons traiter tout le monde de manière égale.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We should treat everyone equally.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ dàodǐ xiǎng yào shénme?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Qu'est-ce que tu veux exactement ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What exactly do you want?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Fāshēng le shénme shì?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Qu'est-ce qui s'est passé ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What happened?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ yī tiān chī sān dùn fàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je mange trois repas par jour.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I eat three meals a day.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xìnxī yǐjīng fāsòng chénggōng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le message a été envoyé avec succès.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The message has been sent successfully.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这超出了我的能力范围。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè chāochū le wǒ de nénglì fànwéi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cela dépasse mes compétences.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is beyond my ability.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ gǎn bu gǎn chángshì yīxià?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Oses-tu essayer ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Do you dare to try?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zǒngtǒng zhèngzài fǎngwèn Zhōngguó.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le président est en visite en Chine.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The president is visiting China.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 房东说下个月要涨房租。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Fángdōng shuō xià gè yuè yào zhǎng fángzū.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le propriétaire a dit que le loyer augmentera le mois prochain.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The landlord said the rent will increase next month.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhèxiē fángwū shì xīnjiàn de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ces bâtiments sont nouvellement construits.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: These buildings are newly built.
